thread.title: Fresh A400M charge clouds strong Airbus 2017 profits

title: Fresh A400M charge clouds strong Airbus 2017 profits
text:
Fresh A400M charge clouds strong Airbus 2017 profits 4:44am EST - 01:14 
Airbus took a 1.3 billion euro ($1.6 billion) hit on its delayed A400M military transport plane, lifting charges on Europe's troubled defence project above 8 billion euros and clouding higher than expected underlying profits and cash. Julian Sattethwaite reports   
Airbus took a 1.3 billion euro ($1.6 billion) hit on its delayed A400M military transport plane, lifting charges on Europe's troubled defence project above 8 billion euros and clouding higher than expected underlying profits and cash. Julian Sattethwaite reports  //reut.rs/2sxXDvJ
